translations: 设备，器具；机构，组织；器官；评论性注释

sentences.sentence: One of the boys had to be rescued by firemen wearing breathing apparatus.
sentences.translation: 其中的一个男孩得由戴着呼吸设备的消防队员们营救。

sentences.sentence: They lacked the scientific personnel to develop the technical apparatus much further.
sentences.translation: 他们缺少进一步研发这些技术设备的科技人员。

sentences.sentence: Firefighters needed breathing apparatus to enter the burning house.
sentences.translation: 消防队员需要呼吸器以便进入燃烧的大楼。
